name: Yokai Pachinko, Spirits Hunter
description:
You play as a Japanese samurai warrior whose goal is to become the master of the yokai by controlling them. With the experience of your sensei, you will have to fight with courage and fervor in order to defeat all the yokai that you will meet.

This game was made to play with a spécial Controller.

Q & D to move right / left - Space to Jump

C to quick attack - V for Spécial Attack - R To roll the power

Use a joystick to aim 

GAME PROGRAMMING : Antoine DIRION - Alexandre SANCHES MATEUS

GAME ART : Marc-Amaury FAURIS

GAME DESIGN : Gregoire VOTTERO

CONTROLLEURS : Amelie MARTIN - Alizee PENON

DIRECTION ARTISTIQUE : Idiriss DEMBELE - Manel DRIDI - Ambre LHENRY

CHARA DESIGN & DECORS : Ema GILLARD SANTINI

SOUND DESIGN : Guillaume RICHER
